damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: Outcast Nobz pilot these lumbering war engines, following the echoing call of the Great Waaagh! out across the stars. They are welcomed by Ork warbands wherever they go, for the punishing hails of firepower they can unleash are devastating, and few foes can long survive the grasp of their enormous, piston-powered klaws.

otherAbilities.Clankin’ Forward:: Each time this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding MONSTER and VEHICLE models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.
otherAbilities.Big an’ Stompy:: Each time this model makes a melee attack, if you have called a Waaagh! this battle round , add 1 to the Hit roll .
